channel.title: Npc drops and even more problems?!
channel.description:
3200=6585,1-1,30:30;1053,1-1,2:2;4087,1-1,50:100; Im trying to make a chaos elemental drop these items 6585,1053,and 4087 for example the 6585 is fury it does drop but i want it do be 50% drop rate idk what 30:30 is is one of those the drop rate? also i have 2 other problems:
1.I need to make it where when i drop items it doesnt dissapear (for drop party) 2.When you die in pk you drop random crap? i want it to drop what the player has so if you or anyone could help that would be awesome!
If anyone can help ill do whatever i can to say thank you.
Im using tokkul-scape source 508 v3.5 For my new server [img]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z451/Horror-Scape/horror-scapebanner.png?t=1293207343[/img]

item.title: Npc drops and even more problems?!
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

So basically if i set it to 3200:70
That means the npc id is 3200=chaos elemental and the item has a 70% chance of dropping?
And do you know how to answer my other 2 problems?

Read full topic
item.source: Npc drops and even more problems?!

item.title: Npc drops and even more problems?!
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

30:30

The first number represents the NPC ID, the second number represents the percentage for the drop, so say if itâ€™s 30 like you have, there would be a 70% chance of getting a rare drop ( the higher the less ).

Then add the rare items under.

Read full topic
